title: Ian McFarland, director of “The Godfathers of Hardcore” and Blood For Blood
itunes:title: Ian McFarland, director of “The Godfathers of Hardcore” and Blood For Blood
description:
The director of the highly acclaimed documentary about Agnostic Front entitled "The Godfathers of Hardcore", Ian McFarland, is on the show this week. We get in deep on self reflection, music videos and being a “rock star”. Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order. The best place for all of your VIP experiences at shows is with Soundrink. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
